name: @tonutils/tl
description: A comprehensive and easy-to-use TL (Type Language) toolkit for Node.js and TypeScript, designed to facilitate the generation and usage of type descriptions, constructors, and functions in a type-safe manner. This package streamlines the process of TL marshaling and enables developers to effortlessly integrate TL-based data serialization and deserialization in their decentralized applications.
author: thekiba <hr@thekiba.io>, goreactdev <goreactdev12@gmail.com>
